extension.description: Integrate Limbo Media Server with your Joomla site

field.name: serverUrl
field.description: Insert Your Limbo Media Server address with port. Example: http://localhost:8000
field.label: Limbo Media Server's URL

field.name: adminUsername
field.description: You will need insert one username that has ROLE_ADMINISTRATION privilege
field.label: Limbo Media Server's Username (ROLE_ADMINISTRATION)

field.name: authorities
field.description: You can add more authorities rights. Should be comma (,) separated. Example: ROLE_READ,ROLE_ADMINISTRATION
field.label: Default Authorities
